thread.title: We loved this hotel
thread.title_full: We loved this hotel - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Brina58
title: We loved this hotel
text: The title says it all really, we really loved this hotel. Old, quaint and quirky but in a fabulous location. This hotel has amazing staff, I cannot praise them enough, they were great, always helpful, friendly and professional at all times. We managed to secure the last room in the hotel and when we booked we were advised that the room was quite small. However it was perfectly adequate for us but I liked that the hotel advised us of this. The breakfasts were superb and we are here one evening and had a delicious meal. Well done to the kitchen staff. Will definitely return to this hotel.
